availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Duffey (Hamilton County, Ohio, cooper)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Dublin, Ireland. Son of Mich. Duffy and Ellen Russell Duffy. Student in Kenton County in 1850. Cooper in Cincinnati in 1860. Victim of stabbing by William Nichols in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 13 , p. 301.
Catholic Parish Registers, 1655-1915, St. James Parish, 1830-1872, National Library of Ireland; Dublin, Ireland; Microfilm # 07228 / 04, p. 130.
Find A Grave, "George V. Duffey (1846-1913)," Memorial #155620779, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/155620779 (accessed February 21, 2019).
